page.title: 07HOME LIFE
page.content: I live in a house in Teignmouth i have a sister and brother, on saturday i get up at 7.30 and watch t.v.a.m. on the television i have a friend around i help dad do the garden, and mum do the washing-up i sometimes clean my bedroom .my mum has got a sewing machine when she has time i sit with her and make Barbies clothes.My dog gets dirty and we have to give him a bath when he gets back from his walk. I have a bath on sunday and get ready for bed. We have the jeep at the weekend and often go on the moors.I like playing darts and rounders with my brother and sister and play cassettes. My Brother sometimes allows me to spend my pocket money.
